rules: Rule1: Provided that the chemical is pure, the facility is approved.
Rule2: Whenever a batch is quarantined, it is also rejected.
Rule3: Under the condition that a batch is retested, it follows that the batch is quarantined.
Rule4: If the technician is authorized, then in the event that the chemical is not stable or not pure, the batch is retested.
Rule5: Either the technician is authorized, or the technician is supervised.
Rule6: Provided the technician is supervised, then if it is not the case that the chemical is stable or not the case that it is pure, the batch is retested.
Rule7: Whenever the equipment is malfunctioning, the equipment is operational.
Rule8: Either the equipment is malfunctioning, or the facility is approved.
Rule9: Provided that maintenance is scheduled, then spare parts are available, or in case the equipment is malfunctioning, the equipment is not operational.
Rule10: The supplier is approved, or the lab is certified.
Rule11: Whenever maintenance is emergency, then spare parts are available, or if the equipment is malfunctioning, it is not operational.
Rule12: Provided that the facility is compliant, then maintenance is scheduled or maintenance is emergency.
Rule13: The instruments are calibrated, or if the environment is sterile, the facility is approved.
Rule14: The license is renewed, or the permit is not valid.
Rule15: If the lab is certified, then the raw materials are not contaminated.
Rule16: Provided that samples are analyzed, the batch is quarantined.
Rule17: If the technician is trained, then whenever the chemical is not stable or not pure, samples are analyzed.
Rule18: Either the technician is trained, or the technician is experienced.
Rule19: Provided the specifications are met, then if the technician is experienced, whenever the chemical is not stable or not pure, samples are analyzed.
Rule20: Whenever the test is passed, the analysis is confirmed.
Rule21: Either the test is passed, or the results are verified.
Rule22: Provided that the results are verified, the specifications are met.
Rule23: Under the condition that the analysis is confirmed, the specifications are met.
Rule24: If the solution is filtered, the product is not contaminated.
Rule25: Either the solution is filtered, or the solution is distilled.
Rule26: Whenever the product is hazardous, it is not safe.
Rule27: If the check is routine, maintenance is scheduled.
Rule28: Under the condition that the check is urgent, maintenance is emergency.
Rule29: Whenever the equipment is repaired, the equipment is calibrated.
Rule30: Provided that the equipment is tested, the system is functioning.
Rule31: Under the condition that the equipment is calibrated, the equipment is tested.
Rule32: Provided that records are reviewed, then if the process is documented, whenever the facility is not compliant, the product is compliant.
Rule33: Either records are reviewed, or records are audited.
Rule34: Under the condition that records are audited, then if the process is documented, provided that the facility is not compliant, the product is compliant.
Rule35: If the component is damaged, the equipment is not operational.
Rule36: If the spill is contained, then in the event that it is not the case that the tank being cracked implies the valve is not leaking, the chemical is spilled.
Rule37: Either the spill is contained, or the area is cleaned.
Rule38: Provided that the area is cleaned, then if it is not the case that the tank being cracked implies the valve is not leaking, the chemical is spilled.
Rule39: If the audit is internal, then the audit is scheduled, or maintenance is scheduled, or maintenance is emergency.
Rule40: Either the audit is internal, or the audit is external.
Rule41: Under the condition that the audit is external, then the audit is scheduled, or maintenance is scheduled, or maintenance is emergency.

Rule42: If the cleanroom is maintained, then provided that it is not the case that the environment being sterile implies the facility is approved and sterility is not compromised, the batch is not contaminated.
Rule43: Whenever the check is daily, the cleanroom is maintained.
Rule44: Provided that the check is hourly, the cleanroom is maintained.
Rule45: If the environment is monitored, then the check is daily or the check is hourly.
Rule46: Either the test is positive, or the test is negative.
Rule47: Provided that the test is negative, then whenever the environment is sterile, the facility is approved.
Rule48: If the drug is packaged, the drug is manufactured.
Rule49: Whenever the temperature is high, the humidity is high.
Rule50: If the technician is senior, then provided the protocol is revised, the protocol is approved.
Rule51: Provided that the technician is lead, then if the protocol is revised, the protocol is approved.
Rule52: Whenever the error is major, the error is not minor.
Rule53: If the drug is shipped, the drug is packaged.
Rule54: Provided that the chemical is stable, the facility is approved.
Rule55: In the event that it is not the case that the equipment malfunctioning implies the component is damaged, the valve is leaking.
Rule56: Under the condition that it is not the case that the equipment malfunctioning implies the component is damaged, the tank is cracked.
Rule57: If it is not the case that the supplier being approved implies the raw materials are not contaminated, the inspection fails.
Rule58: Provided that it is not the case that the environment being sterile implies the facility is approved, sterility is not compromised.
Rule59: Whenever it is not the case that procedures are documented or the instruments are not calibrated, the protocol is revised.
Rule60: Under the condition that it is not the case that procedures are documented or the instruments are not calibrated, the protocol is not approved.
Rule61: If it is not the case that the solution being distilled implies the product is not contaminated, the batch is not discarded.
Rule62: Whenever it is not the case that the check is routine or urgent, the equipment is repaired.
Rule63: If it is not the case that the test being positive implies that if the environment is sterile, the facility is approved, the temperature is high.
Rule64: Under the condition that it is not the case that the technician is senior or lead, the error is minor.
Rule65: Provided that it is not the case that the technician is senior or lead, the error is major.
Rule66: Whenever it is not the case that the chemical is stable or pure, the product is contaminated.
Rule67: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that the environment being sterile implies the facility is approved, sterility is compromised, the batch is contaminated.
Rule68: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that procedures are documented or the instruments are not calibrated, the protocol is approved, the permit is valid.
Rule69: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that the solution being distilled implies the product is not contaminated, the batch is discarded, the product is safe.
Rule70: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that the solution being distilled implies the product is not contaminated, the batch is discarded, the product is hazardous.

Rule71: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that the supplier being approved implies the raw materials are not contaminated, the inspection does not fail, the product is recalled, the drug is shipped.
Rule72: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the facility is not compliant, the company is fined, the license is suspended.
Rule73: Provided that it is not the case that if the facility is not compliant, the company is fined, the license is not suspended.
Rule74: Under the condition that the facility is not compliant, the product is not compliant.
Rule75: Provided the facility is not approved, the raw materials are contaminated.
facts: Fact4: It is not the case that the batch is rejected.
Fact5: It is not the case that spare parts are available.
Fact6: It is not the case that the company is fined.
Fact7: It is not the case that procedures are documented.
Fact8: It is not the case that the license is renewed.
Fact9: It is not the case that the system is functioning.
Fact10: It is not the case that the product is recalled.
Fact11: It is not the case that the chemical is spilled.
Fact12: It is not the case that the audit is scheduled.
Fact13: It is not the case that the drug is manufactured.
Fact14: It is not the case that the humidity is high.
